name: Travel to Another SSW Office
description: Use this template when writing an email about visiting another SSW city office and outlining tasks.
subjectTemplate: {{ YOUR NAME }} - Working from {{ CITY }} for {{ X }} days
bodyTemplateHtml:
Hi {{ city }} Team,

{{ intro }}

As per my conversation with {{ state_manager }}, I will be visiting your office for {{ visit_duration }} to:

  1. {{ task_1 }}
  2. {{ task_2 }}
  3. {{ task_3 }}

Looking forward to seeing you all.

{{ your_name }}
